noLayerSwitcherMessage: This map has no layer switcher, which indicates that you are not allowed to use this map!
networkErrorMessage: Netwerkfout. Probeer de pagina opnieuw te laden door op F5 te drukken.
parseErrorMessage: Configuratiefout. Probeer de pagina opnieuw te laden door op F5 te drukken.

announcements.text: This demo message from Hajk will show only once.
Your browser is not supported anymore. Please update to a modern browser.
